channel.title: Need help with this webclient error
channel.description:
Okay, so i need help with this webclient error. I've opened the Java console and found this, so i would be really happy if you solved this tricky problem. So you know its an Project Insanity client transformed to webclient with JUSTINNN's guide from [size=2pt]Run3-Server[/size]
[code=text]Directory exists Directory exists Directory exists Directory exists Directory exists Directory exists Directory exists Directory exists Error: loaderror Connecting to fileserver 10 Exception in thread "Thread-73" java.lang.NullPointerException at client.showErrorScreen(client.java:7700) at client.processDrawing(client.java:8899) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108) at client.run(client.java:4673) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) java.lang.NullPointerException at client.cleanUpForQuit(client.java:4891) at RSApplet.exit(RSApplet.java:132) at RSApplet.destroy(RSApplet.java:174) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager$AppletExecutionRunnable.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Directory exists Directory exists Directory exists Directory exists Directory exists Directory exists Directory exists Directory exists Error: loaderror Connecting to fileserver 10 Exception in thread "Thread-88" java.lang.NullPointerException at client.showErrorScreen(client.java:7700) at client.processDrawing(client.java:8899) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108) at client.run(client.java:4673) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) java.lang.NullPointerException at client.cleanUpForQuit(client.java:4891) at RSApplet.exit(RSApplet.java:132) at RSApplet.destroy(RSApplet.java:174) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager$AppletExecutionRunnable.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Directory exists Directory exists Directory exists Directory exists Directory exists Directory exists Directory exists Directory exists Error: loaderror Connecting to fileserver 10 java.lang.NullPointerException at client.cleanUpForQuit(client.java:4891) at RSApplet.exit(RSApplet.java:132) at RSApplet.destroy(RSApplet.java:174) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager$AppletExecutionRunnable.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Exception in thread "Thread-97" java.lang.NullPointerException at client.showErrorScreen(client.java:7700) at client.processDrawing(client.java:8899) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108) at client.run(client.java:4673) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Directory exists Directory exists Directory exists Directory exists Directory exists Directory exists Directory exists Directory exists Error: loaderror Connecting to fileserver 10 [/code]
[img]http://img715.imageshack.us/img715/1154/sorryanerror.jpg[/img]

item.title: Need help with this webclient error
item.dc:creator: @yo_dude_1345 yo dude 1345
item.description:
@yo_dude_1345 wrote:

I could fix this problem for you no probllem but… your going to have to send me a link of you client. Alsso make sre it has bolth .java and .class files.

Read full topic
